backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, chats, subscriptions, and access control with storage maps and CRUD-style query/update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping design/animation features to affected frontend files and related components for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten list summarizing major frontend files, their purposes, and feature-relevant behavior.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH color theme and dark-mode variables with base styling for the app.
frontend/index.html: Simple HTML shell mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling auth flow, profile setup gating, and rendering the main app shell.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginScreen.t: Login UI with pastel styling, animated icon, pressable login button, and ambient sparkles.
frontend/src/features/chat/ChatListScree: Chat list screen fetching user chats and rendering interactive chat rows with timestamps and empty-state support.
frontend/src/features/chat/ChatThreadScr: Renders a chat thread with message history, sending logic, error handling for limits, and auto-scrolling.
frontend/src/features/chat/limits.ts: Parses chat limit error messages and returns a user-friendly upgrade prompt string.
frontend/src/features/city/CityPickerShe: Bottom sheet UI for selecting a city from a list or entering a custom one.
frontend/src/features/home/DiscoveryList: Displays a grid of user cards and notifies parent when a profile is selected.
frontend/src/features/home/HomeScreen.ts: Main discovery screen handling city selection, search filtering, profile loading, and navigation to user previews or chat.
frontend/src/features/home/UserCard.tsx: Shows a compact user profile card with photo, distance, bio, and interests.
frontend/src/features/home/UserPreviewSh: Bottom sheet preview of a user with actions like start chat, block, or report, including limit error handling.
frontend/src/features/moderation/ReportD: Dialog for submitting an anonymous user report with selectable reasons and optional details.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfileEdi: Provides a form for editing an existing user profile, handling validation, photo updates, and saving via a mutation.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfilePho: Allows users to select, preview, validate, and remove a profile photo using file input and ExternalBlob storage.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfileScr: Displays the user's profile with photo, details, and logout, and toggles into an edit form when requested.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfileSet: Initial profile creation form collecting name, city, interests, gender, and photo, then saving via a mutation.
frontend/src/features/shared/components/: Renders an empty-state illustration with a title, description, and optional action.
frontend/src/features/shared/format.ts: Contains helpers for formatting timestamps, trimming interest lists, and generating randomized distance labels.
frontend/src/features/shared/motion/Ambi: Shows floating heart and sparkle icons unless reduced motion is enabled.
frontend/src/features/shared/motion/Lift: Creates a pressable card that visually lifts on pointer interaction unless reduced motion is enabled.
frontend/src/features/shared/motion/Pres: Provides a pressable wrapper adding scale and bounce effects and optional onPress handling.
Implements a row component that highlights on press with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/features/shared/motion/Scre: Applies a fade-and-slide-in animation on key changes unless reduced motion is preferred.
frontend/src/features/shared/motion/useR: Custom hook detecting the user's reduced‑motion preference via a media query.
frontend/src/features/shell/AppShell.tsx: Manages main tab navigation, renders screens with transitions, and handles opening/closing chat threads.
frontend/src/features/shell/BottomNav.ts: Renders a bottom navigation bar with tab icons and triggers tab changes.
frontend/src/features/subscription/plans: Defines subscription plan metadata and exports a catalog of available plans.
frontend/src/features/subscription/Upgra: Provides a dialog for selecting and activating subscription plans, with plan cards and upgrade actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Wraps Internet Identity to expose auth state, principal, login, and logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider managing identity loading, login, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for profiles, discovery, chats, messages, and subscription plan operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme variables with a pastel palette and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including from hash), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, shadows, animations, and container settings, including plugins for typography, container queries, and animation.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, including app summary, architecture notes, existing features, and version metadata.
